statements: DELETE FROM kpi_performance WHERE employee_id = 100 AND kpi_name = 'Efficiency';
DELETE FROM kpi_performance WHERE employee_id = 100 AND kpi_date < '2021-01-01';
DELETE FROM kpi_performance WHERE kpi_name = 'Efficiency' AND kpi_value > 80.5;

DELETE FROM individual_performance WHERE name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE employee_id = 100 AND kpi_name = 'Sales';
DELETE FROM employees WHERE id = 101 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM teams WHERE team_name = 'Marketing' AND leader = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM team_kpi_data WHERE metric_id = 3 AND kpi_value < 50;
